She raises her foot over him and he gets up and runs while purposely stomps down behind him missing him but shaking the ground and knocking him down. He gets up to run and hears her booming voice. "FEE FI FO FUM! I SMELL THE FEAR OF A TINY MAN! WHEN I CATCH HIM I'LL GRIND HIS BONES AND STOMP HIM DEAD!" Putting her own spin on the phrase with her cute accent as she stomps after Geoff. She is absolutely terrifying and can see how she is such a good actor. He runs while she stomps after him slowly, purposely missing him. Her foot slams down in front of him and he runs straight into it, tasting her sweaty flesh which makes him gag. "Hahaha. Where do you think you're going?" Her sweaty musky foot smell is all around him as she brings her other foot next her foot. He is between her massive sweaty smelly feet while she grins down.

"You know what I do to itsy bitsy bug men I find? I crush em!" She raises her foot over Geoff and grins. "But first smell my feet!" She brings her huge foot down and smothers him under her sweaty foot. It smells awful, like a locker room beneath her foot. She presses down so he can barely breathe and inhales her musky scent. She makes him smell different parts of her foot as she moves it around on him. The foot lifts off and she grins down. "Time to stomp the little buggy. Buh bye buggy!" Her massive foot raises over him. He stares at the colossal reddened sweaty sole before she stomps him. She then proceeds to stomp him over and over while she grinds her foot on him.

She lifts her foot off him after destroying him underfoot. "Now if anyone ever asks if you have real acting experience, you can say you did a scene with Margot Robbie!" She laughs as she puts her foot back on him. She begins to roll him from heel to toe under her sweaty foot while grinning. Geoff has her foot sweat and grime rubbed onto him as he is rolled under the massive musky foot.
1553322222222211.title: Margot Robbie Giantess

15533222222222111.content:
Margot giggled as she felt his tiny form being rolled under her big sweaty foot. She lifted her foot off Geoff and grinned down at him. She grabbed him up and dangled him over a light gray Nike running shoe. The smell of from the shoe was awful, smelling like sweaty feet as she dangled him over the mouth. He looked down and saw a dark area where her heel normally rested when the shoe was on. Geoff squirmed as he was pinched by his shirt between her thumb and forefinger before she released him. He landed on the spongy insole and the smell of feet became ten times worse. "Can't have you running away now can I?" She said grinning down at him. She walked away laughing while Geoff took in his surroundings. The shoe smelled like sweaty feet and had an imprint of her foot on the insole. He heard loud footsteps and looked up to see Margot standing over the shoe grinning down.

Margot had changed into a light gray tank top and short black shorts that clung to her toned thighs. She smirked as she said "I'm going on a run and you're going to be my living insole." Geoff became panicked as she laughed as her toes gripped the back of the shoe. The massive tan toes with their whites nails tipped the shoe up so he tumbled to the heel before her foot began to slide in. "No socks, sniff!" She laughed as she watched him turn to run. "I'd go to the toe section if I were you." Her foot was sliding in and Geoff ran as fast he could. The tan foot caught him, pulling him beneath it and he was dragged along her grimy insole. He was under her toes and she wiggled and scrunched them on his tiny body. The smell was absolutely awful. Her sweaty stinky foot along with the sweaty smell in the shoe and cheesy scent of her toes was overwhelming. She giggled as she felt him squirming under her foot.

Geoff continued squirming before the giantess moved her foot. She lifted her foot and maneuvered him under her foot. Margot tied her shoe tight and grinned as she stood up. Geoff felt her weight bearing down on him as she stood. He was underfoot having been moved from the toes and was squashed underfoot. He was smashed down painfully as she stood. This is awful he thought as he felt almost weightless. She was walking to the door and as she stepped he felt the weight lift off him. As her foot landed, all her weight slammed down on him. He was smothered by her stinky foot flesh as she stepped. This process repeated as she went outside and began her run. He was smashed under her as she ran. As she ran, her foot began to get sweaty and the insole was getting damp. Her sweaty foot flesh engulfed him as her booming steps crushed him. It was hot and humid in the shoe as sweat got into his mouth, nose, eyes and soaked him. It burned and tasted awful as he thought of how she was carelessly crushing him. He couldn't do anything besides get pounded underfoot while Margot ran.

It was hard to breathe for Geoff in her shoe. Every breath was him just inhaling lungfuls of sweaty musky scented air. He would have all his air squeezed out of him when her foot landed and her running was a painful breathing cycle for him. He felt his rib cage compress as she ran and wished he would just pop under her sweaty foot. Margot meanwhile was greatly enjoying her run. Geoff was weak and sucking in foot sweat and struggling to breathe as her foot dominated his world. Please let this end he thought.

Margot finally returned to her apartment. She decided to take the stairs and pounded up them crushing Geoff painfully under her sweaty foot. When she got into her place she pried the shoes off with her feet and giggled as she felt Geoff being dragged by her foot. She used the back of the shoe to scrap him off her sweaty foot and he plopped onto her sweaty insole. He was soaked by her foot sweat and all he could smell was her sweaty musky feet. She stood the shoe and grinned. Her tank top was soaked with sweat and her blonde hair was pulled back into a ponytail. She knocked over the smelly running shoe and Geoff tumbled out as she sat down. "Nothing like a nice 5 mile run." She said smiling as she stretched out. She crossed her legs at the ankles and Geoff stared up at her massive form. She was a goddess, a sweaty goddess who could easily crush him if she felt like it. Her toned tanned legs glistened with sweat and she looked sweaty. Her feet reeked and the large soles were reddened and sweaty as they towered over him, the toes wiggling and the massive soles flexing. She grinned as she said "So bug man, why don't you...
15533222222222111.title: She puts you in her shoes and goes for a run

choices: She makes Geoff smell her flats
She makes Geoff kiss and lick her feet
1553322222222212.content:
"Enough licking for now" Margot says, suddenly pulling her feet out of Geoff's mouth. She rubbed Geoff's sweat off her feet on the carpet right next to his head. There was still some sweat on her feet that he hadn't licked off. Taking a roll of tape that she had in her room, she taped his mouth so that he could only breathe through his nose.

Margot planted her left foot on one of his cheeks and her right foot just above his face. She lowered her foot so that the ball of her foot was inches away from his nose. "Take deep sniffs" Geoff started reluctantly sniffing her feet. As usual they smelled quite sweaty and smelly and although he hated it, he knew he had no choice but to obey her. She made sure that he inhaled her sweat long enough in each breathe and didn't exhale for too long, so that he would be constantly smelling her feet. "Don't stop breathing" After a while she started moving her sweaty bare foot around in front of his nose, getting to smell her heel, sole, ball of the foot and in between the toes. She then slid her foot down his face again and again, making sure that he smelled them hard every time it moved down his face. She swapped feet and did the same thing with her other foot. She also pinched his nose between her toes, making Geoff have a bigger whiff of her toes.

After a while she then rubbed both of her feet all over his face. She was rubbing the sweat onto his face, particularly the nose. His nose stinged of the sweaty smell from her feet. After a few minutes, his face smelled of her feet. Geoff still felt that her feet felt sweaty and unbearable but his initial pain was starting to die down. Not completely, he would still get out of there if he was given the chance, but he wasn't as urgent to get out of there like a few minutes earlier. Maybe he was starting to get used to this.
1553322222222212.title: She continues her fun

15533222222222121.content:
Geoff watched as Margot Robbie grabbed one her black flats and brought it up to her face. She took a sniff of the flat and immediately moved it away from her face. "Wow that's fresh." She giggled as she moved the flat towards Geoff. "My feet get really sweaty when I wear flats. I've been walking around all day and haven't been able to take them off." As you twist your head back and forth, she giggles. She placed her sweaty feet on their sides and pressed the soles against the side of his head hard saying, "Stop squirming or I'll make you clean every pair of shoes I have." Geoff stopped squirming as she removed her feet and pressed the flat over his face.

Geoff was assaulted by the stench of sweaty feet. The flat smelled awful and he was forced to breathe it in. It was well worn and he could see the grimy imprint of her foot on the insole. "Smell my flats. Take it all in." You never would of thought that such a gorgeous woman like Margot Robbie would have smelly feet. She forced you to smell the flat before lifting it off and replacing it with the other one. She forced him to smell the sweaty stench while she laughed and taunted him. "Deep breathes. I want to you to hear you inhale." You did as she said and took deep whiffs of the flat. He hated this and just wanted her to stop. She made him smell the flats for some time while she would smack his cheeks with her soles when she wasn't satisfied with the deep breathes he took. She then lifted the flat off and grinned down at him.

"I hope you enjoyed the smell of my flats." She grinned down at him. "That's the first of many pairs of shoes you'll be smelling." She said as she slapped his cheek with her foot. He thought he had the smell of her feet stuck in his nose. It was all he could smell. She smirked at him as she decided what she wanted to do with him next.
15533222222222121.title: She makes Geoff smell her flats

choices: Tell her that you are liking it
Tell her that you aren't liking it.
15533222222222122.content:
Margot took her sweaty feet from your face and nose, allowing you to breathe fresh air, however you could tell that your face still smelled of her feet. She leaned forward and peeled the tape off your mouth, you noticed that she did this slowly. Maybe she's taking a liking to you and didn't want to hurt you. "I need your mouth again". She said. "Turn on your front"

You turned on your front and Margot placed her feet on the carpet in front of you. You gazed at the tops of her feet. You had to admit, her feet didn't look half bad. "Kiss" she beckoned to you. You paused for a moment. You glanced up at her, she smirked down at you. You slowly and nervously leaned forward and began to place kisses on her feet. Her feet still felt quite warm as you pressed your lips against them. She giggled as she watched you worship her. You had a feeling that she's never had anyone do this for her. Though you were mostly focussed on her feet, you could see out of the corner of your eye her leaning back in her seat. She felt like a goddess and was enjoying every second of this. "Am I your queen?" She asked. "Yes you are" you instinctively responded, to which she grinned. You felt compelled to continue.

"Get up on your knees" she said. You did so. She gave such a sexy smile at you, you almost forget that she made you her slave and was forcing you to worship her feet. In your mind, you were serving a goddess, who was taking a liking to you. You suddenly wanted to please her. She pressed her foot against your mouth and knowing what she wanted, you kissed it obediently. She giggled to herself. You began to kiss all around her feet. With every kiss you gave, you felt even more beneath her feet, even more her slave. Her feet also felt great to kiss, both the tops and soles, particularly the soles.

"Lick" she said. You surprised yourself at how quickly you obeyed her. You stuck out your tongue and licked at the soles of her feet, tasting her sweat much more. You licked up and down her feet, from her heels, to her soles, to the balls of her feet to the tops of her toes. Her soles didn't feel rough at all, they were very smooth in fact. She angled her feet in different positions and you licked all around, including her soles, her toes and the top of her feet. You seemed to be getting used to it quite a bit because you were less hesitant and sped up as time went on.

Margot seemed to be looking at you curiously as you were worshipping her. "Are you enjoying yourself?" She asked. You thought to yourself, were you enjoying it? What would you tell her?
